EmailTemplate.name: Warranty - Verification not needed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Go to SAP T-Code IQ03 before request a warranty verification. IQ03 already shows this equipment is/not under warranty.
Warranty terms already updated in SAP, on IQ03/Extended Data tab/Customer Warranty/Master Warranty Legend.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
